title: Chestnut and cranberry stuffing
ingredients: ['5 chestnuts', '60g butter, softened', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1/2 small wholemeal roll, cubed', '1-2 sticks celery, chopped', '1/2 apple, peeled, cored and chopped', '100g cranberries', 'fresh thyme', 'fresh marjoram', '1 handful fresh sage, finely chopped', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'sea salt']
